## Loading data 

In the following, we assume that you are working with data stored on your computer or data which can be copied to and stored on your computer.

R can read data from a number of different data file formats:

* RDA and RDS files -- _R Data_ and _R Data Serialization_ 
* CSV -- _Comma Separated Values_
* Microsoft Excel files 
* STATA files
* SPSS
* SAS
